name: Edelweiss Assisted Living
description:
Edelweiss Assisted Living offers a comfortable and secure environment for seniors, providing a variety of services and amenities tailored to meet their unique needs.

About Us

Our facility is designed to provide a home-like atmosphere with modern conveniences and compassionate care. Located in the heart of Massachusetts, we are committed to enhancing the quality of life for our residents.

  • 24/7 medical support
  • Nutritious meals prepared by professional chefs
  • Daily social and recreational activities
  • Housekeeping and laundry services

Our Services

At Edelweiss Assisted Living, we offer a range of services to ensure our residents live comfortably and happily:

Personal Care

We provide personalized care plans to meet the specific needs of each resident, including assistance with daily activities such as bathing, dressing, and medication management.

Health and Wellness

Our on-site healthcare professionals are available around the clock to provide medical care and support, ensuring our residents receive the best possible health services.

"The staff at Edelweiss Assisted Living are like family. They go above and beyond to make sure we are happy and healthy." - Resident's family member

Engaging Activities

We offer a variety of activities to keep our residents active and engaged, including:

  • Arts and crafts
  • Fitness classes
  • Music and dance
  • Group outings and excursions

Our goal is to create a vibrant community where residents can enjoy their golden years with dignity and joy. For more information or to schedule a tour, please contact us or call us at (857) 547-2000.
